World-class R&D on AI for Time Series (AI4TS) Analysis & Applications

  • Top AI Papers: published (NeurIPS, ICML, ICLR) x23, (KDD, WWW, ACL) x17, (AAAI, IJCAI) x12, (SIGMOD, VLDB, ICDE) x7, (IEEE Trans) x15, etc.
  • Workshops & Tutorials: organized 20+ events @ KDD, AAAI, IJCAI, WWW, ICDM, SDM, ICAIF, etc.
  • Applications: Forecasting, Forecasting+Optimization/Decision, Anomaly Detection, Anomaly Detection+Root-cause/Insight Analysis, Classification, Imputation, etc., in Cloud Computing/AIOps, Energy/Power System, Weather/Earth System, E-Commerce/BI, Healthcare/BCI, Finance, etc., related to Sequential Data (Time Series, Spatio-Temporal, Event, etc.).

Github Repo on AI for Time Series

  • Large (Language) Models for Time Series & Spatio-Temporal Data (LM4TS & LM4STD) [GitHub link] (~1.2k stars)
    A professionally curated list of awesome resources (paper, code, data, etc.) on Large (Language) Models for Time Series and Spatio-Temporal Data.
  • Self-Supervised Learning for Time Series (SSL4TS) [GitHub link] ([TPAMI'24])
    A professionally curated list of awesome resources (paper, code, data, etc.) on Self-Supervised Learning for Time Series.
  • Graph Neural Networks for Time Series (GNN4TS) [GitHub link] ([TPAMI'24])
    A professionally curated list of awesome resources (paper, code, data, etc.) on Graph Neural Networks for Time Series.
  • Transformers for Time Series (Trans4TS) [GitHub link] (~3k+ stars) ([IJCAI'23])
    A professionally curated list of awesome resources (paper, code, data, etc.) on Transformers for Time Series.
  • Diffusion Models for Time Series & Spatio-Temporal Data (Diff4TS & Diff4STD) [GitHub link]
    A professionally curated list of awesome resources (paper, code, data, etc.) on Diffusion Models for Time Series & Spatio-Temporal Data.
  • Imputation for Time Series (TSI-Bench) [GitHub link]
    A professionally curated list of awesome resources (paper, code, data, etc.) on Imputation for Time Series.
  • Papers, Tutorials, and Surveys on AI for Time Series (AI4TS) [GitHub link] (~1.5k stars)
    A professionally curated list of Papers, Tutorials, and Surveys on AI for Time Series in top AI conferences and journals.
